attributes.action: All GCSE students should have 1 hour of political education every week.
attributes.additional_details: The course could be a simplified version of the A level Government and Politics course that would not include subjects such as pressure groups and corporations.
attributes.background: Many people believe that the voting age should be lowered to 16 however many 16 year olds are not interested or not educated in politics and would only fuel the voter crisis in Briatin. Every student in years 10 and 11 would be taught about political parties and the first past the post system.
